headline.main: ACTION IN A TIME OF CRISIS

lead_paragraph: The President has sent his message to Congress in one of the great crises of the war. Under Hitler's savage blows, Russian resistance is weakening. We are not yet compelled to abandon hope that the Russian armies may be saved, that a new front may be formed, that Hitler may still be forced to fight the Winter War he dreads.
abstract: ed on weakening of USSR resistance
